price_distance_cancellation.description: Cancel plan if price moves beyond threshold percentage away from entry

time_based_cancellation.description: Cancel if plan is old (>max_age_hours) and price hasn't approached entry (>price_distance_threshold away)

structure_cancellation.description: Cancel if market structure invalidates setup (support/resistance broken)

condition_invalidation.description: Cancel if original conditions become impossible (order block invalidated, liquidity sweep occurred, etc.)

volatility_cancellation.description: Cancel if volatility regime changes significantly (future enhancement)

re_evaluation_rules.description: Re-evaluate plan conditions when price moves significantly
